definitions.definition: Typical of a class, group, or body of opinion.
definitions.example: these courses are representative of those taken by most Harvard undergraduates

definitions.definition: (of a legislative or deliberative assembly) consisting of people chosen to act and speak on behalf of a wider group.
definitions.example: the new government lacked a representative assembly

definitions.definition: Serving as a portrayal or symbol of something.
definitions.example: the show should be more representative of how women really are

definitions.definition: A person chosen or appointed to act or speak for another or others.
definitions.example: the Duke of Gloucester would attend the coronation as the representative of his father, King George V

definitions.definition: An example of a class or group.
definitions.example: fossil representatives of lampreys and hagfishes
